top_comments_top.body:
Hello and welcome to r/LifeProTips!

Please help us decide if this post is a good fit for the subreddit by up or downvoting this comment. 

If you think that this is great advice to improve your life, please upvote. If you think this doesn't help you in any way, please downvote. If you don't care, leave it for the others to decide.
Easier said than done. Current employment market will extract everything out of you even in a 9to5 job.

“don’t let work consume your life.”

my goodness, what an idea! why didn’t i think of that?
This man has never been a broke college student.

In my neighborhood when people talk about the *hustle* lifestyle they're usually saying "I steal and/or scam people on the side while working my dead-end job" if they're not just saying "yeah I sell drugs."
